name: 6th Annual International Conference on Chemistry, Chemical Engineering and Chemical Process â€“ CCECP 2018
content: he conference aims to foster and conduct collaborative interdisciplinary research in state-of-the-art methodologies and technologies within Chemistry, Chemical Engineering and Chemical Process. The Chemistry, Chemical Engineering and Chemical Process - CCECP conference 2018 would be the premiere forum to attract participants with different backgrounds, to foster cross-pollination between different research fields, and to expose and discuss innovative theories, frameworks, methodologies, tools, and applications.
